title: Unit Campaign Reports Final (7/1/2010 - 12/31/2018)
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive report of historical activity from the last campaign period (7/1/2010 - 12/31/2018), offering insights into fundraising performance, donor engagement, and key trends to inform future campaign strategies.

title: Prospects Ratings and Predictive Scores
description: This dashboard provides an overview of prospects, displaying their ratings alongside predictive scores to help assess potential giving capacity and prioritize engagement strategies based on data-driven insights.

title: Work Plan Metrics Progress by School/Unit
description: This dashboard tracks a development officer's fundraising activity against their Work Plan goals, with data summarized at the school level. It provides insights into performance, progress toward targets, and highlights areas where additional focus may be needed to meet goals effectively.

title: Fundraiser Scores Adjustable Metrics
description: This dashboard tracks fundraising activity for all development officers, providing comprehensive insights into performance, progress toward goals, and overall fundraising effectiveness across teams.

title: Team Leader Report - Good Neighbors Campaign
description: This dashboard tracks fundraising and cash activity for the Good Neighbors Campaign, offering segmentation by school or cost center. It provides insights into campaign performance, helping to evaluate progress toward goals and optimize fundraising efforts across different areas.

title: Contact Reports Activity
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive overview of contact report activity, segmented by development officer and/or school unit, offering insights into engagement efforts and supporting effective portfolio management.

title: Recent Gifts and Donors
description: This dashboard identifies recent gifts posted to the general ledger (G/L) along with associated donor information, providing insights into new contributions and supporting accurate financial tracking and donor stewardship efforts.

title: 1M+ Prospects
description: This dashboard serves as an audit tool for reviewing prospects rated at $1M+ along with their contact activity. It includes filtering options by development officer and/or school/unit for more targeted analysis.

title: All Pledges Summary
description: This dashboard tracks all open pledge commitments and offers a high-level overview of active, completed, and written-off or canceled pledges, providing insights into pledge performance and fulfillment status.

title: Endowment Funds
description: This dashboard monitors endowment reports for the Stewardship team, providing insights that enable efficient prioritization of stewardship tasks and ensuring timely donor engagement and reporting.

title: Keck - Contact Report Activity
description: This dashboard provides detailed insights into all substantive contact reports for the Keck School of Medicine, highlighting key engagement activities, prospect interactions, and follow-up actions to support strategic fundraising and relationship management efforts.

title: Keck Medicine Financial Summary
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive overview of fundraising and cash activity for the Keck School of Medicine in the current fiscal year. It offers insights into progress toward financial goals, donor contributions, and fundraising trends, supporting data-driven decision-making and strategic planning.

title: Marshall School of Business Top Donors
description: This dashboard highlights the top donors of the Marshall and Leventhal Schools of Business, showcasing key contribution metrics, giving patterns, and donor engagement levels to support strategic stewardship and fundraising initiatives.

title: Audit: 2+ Primary Credits on Proposals
description: This dashboard is an audit tool to identify open proposals with two or more primary credit assignments, enabling users to efficiently review and resolve potential credit attribution discrepancies.

title: Classical California Monthly Revenue Summary
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive overview and comparison of the revenue techniques used for KUSC members in the current fiscal year. It highlights performance across different fundraising strategies, helping to identify effective methods and areas for improvement in revenue generation.

title: Getting Started with Cognos Analytics
description: Introductory training on navigating Cognos Analytics. Covers logging in, finding reports, applying filters, and exporting data to Excel.

title: Building Custom Tableau Dashboards
description: Advanced training on creating custom visualizations in Tableau. Learn to connect data sources, build calculated fields, and publish to Tableau Server.

title: CRM Data Entry Best Practices
description: Step-by-step guide for entering contact reports, proposals, and gift documentation in the CRM system. Includes common errors to avoid and tips for data quality.

title: Running Prospect Lists and Queries
description: Tutorial on using the query builder to create prospect lists. Covers filters, output columns, and saving queries for future use.

title: Understanding Prospect Ratings and Scores
description: Training on interpreting prospect ratings, predictive scores, and wealth indicators. Learn how to use this data to prioritize outreach and engagement strategies.

title: Proposal Management Workflow
description: Comprehensive guide to the proposal lifecycle from creation to closure. Covers stage definitions, required fields, credit assignments, and best practices for tracking.

definition: A legally binding pledge or outright gift made by a donor. Commitments include cash gifts, pledges, planned gifts, and matching gifts recorded at face value.
A written or verbal promise to make a charitable gift over a specified period of time, typically 3-5 years. Pledges are recorded when documented and counted toward campaign totals.
Last Year But Unfortunately Not This year. Refers to donors who gave in the previous fiscal year but have not yet made a gift in the current fiscal year. Key metric for donor retention outreach.
Some Year But Unfortunately Not This year. Refers to donors who gave at some point in the past but have not given in the current fiscal year. Used for lapsed donor reactivation campaigns.
An assessment of a prospect's giving capacity, typically expressed as a dollar range (e.g., $100K-$249K). Ratings are determined through wealth screening, research, and gift officer input.
The process of building and maintaining relationships with donors after a gift is made. Includes acknowledgment, recognition, impact reporting, and ongoing engagement to encourage future giving.
The percentage of donors from a prior period who make a subsequent gift in the current period. Calculated as (Retained Donors / Prior Period Donors) Ã— 100. Industry benchmark is approximately 45%.
An organizational designation used to track fundraising activity and goals at the department or program level. Work Plan Units align proposals and gifts to specific areas for reporting purposes.
A meaningful interaction with a prospect that moves the relationship forward. Includes in-person visits, phone calls, or virtual meetings where cultivation, solicitation, or stewardship occurs.
A transformational gift typically defined as $5 million or more. Principal gifts often support major initiatives, endowed positions, or naming opportunities and require extensive cultivation.

A permanently restricted fund where the principal is invested and only the earnings are used to support the designated purpose. Endowments provide perpetual support for scholarships, professorships, or programs.

The current status of a gift proposal in the fundraising pipeline. Common stages include Identification, Qualification, Cultivation, Solicitation, and Stewardship. Used to forecast and track major gift activity.
